HPI 8610 Nissan Skyline GT-R (BNR32) 1993 JTCC Suzuka Winner M. Hasemi/H. Fukuyama

Purchased: 2015
Manufacturer Page: http://www.hpimodelcar.com/line_up/pop/8610/8610.html

The 1993 Japanese Touring Car Championship (JTCC) series was the last series to be run under Group A regulations. Therefore, this was the last time Skylines competed in the series.

The entire A1 lineup consisted of Skylines and Masahiko Kageyama was the champion with 4 wins. No other driver was able to win more than 1 race that season.

Masahiro Hasemi and Hideo Fukuyama were 2 drivers that got one of those wins in Round 4 at Suzuka driving the car you see below. Hasemi & Fukuyama finished the series in 7th & 8th places.
